mapper.insert: insert into board_report ( board_report_id, board_report_member_id, board_report_board_no, board_report_type, board_report_content ) values ( board_report_seq.nextval, #{boardReportMemberId}, #{boardReportBoardNo}, #{boardReportType}, #{boardReportContent} )
mapper.select: select * from board_report order by board_report_date desc
select board_report_type, count(*) as count from board_report where board_report_board_no = #{boardReportBoardNo} group by board_report_type
select board_text, board_unlike from board where board_no = #{boardReportBoardNo}

select m.member_nickname AS memberNickname, b.board_title AS boardTitle, b.board_writer As boardWriterId, br.board_report_content AS boardReportContent, br.board_report_date AS boardReportDate from board_report br left join member m ON br.board_report_member_id = m.member_id left join board b ON br.board_report_board_no = b.board_no where br.board_report_board_no = #{boardNo} AND br.board_report_type = 'ETC' order by br.board_report_date DESC
